entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm except 15 mm over western sections. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low 9. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
